definition: very good, as in much better than average, a cruel and brutal fellow, to discourage or frighten with threats or a domineering manner
details:
adjective
- very good, as in much better than average
= example: very good, as in much better than average
= synonyms: hot
noun
- a cruel and brutal fellow
= synonyms: tough
- a hired thug
verb
- to discourage or frighten with threats or a domineering manner
= example: to discourage or frighten with threats or a domineering manner
= synonyms: swagger
- to be bossy towards
= example: to be bossy towards
= synonyms: strong-arm
